channel.title: zend studio on Daniel Berstein
channel.description: Recent content in zend studio on Daniel Berstein

item.title: Recommendation :: Yossi Leon
item.author: Daniel Berstein (daniel@basegeo.com)
item.description: Daniel is a responsible and dedicated engineer who put a lot of effort in bringing the company’s site and infrastructure to high level standards. Daniel and I worked close together when it has to do with launching new products. Daniel impressed me with his professional skills and helped me as Product manager to achieve my product’s goals. I’m sure that Daniel will succeed in any company he will work for and i wish him good luck.
